title: 387 candidates pass final CSS examination
content:
ISLAMABAD, Oct 15 (APP): The Federal Public Service Commission (FPSC) announced the final results of the Central Superior Services (CSS) Examination 2024, showing a notably low success rate.
According to the statement issued on Wednesday, a total of 15,602 candidates appeared in the written examination, out of which 397 managed to pass. After the viva voce, 387 candidates were declared successful, reflecting an overall pass percentage of 2.48%.
Of the successful candidates, 229 including 119 male and 110 female candidates, were recommended for posting.
